spell_tooltip.description: Your Consecration clears and suppresses all snare effects on allies within its area of effect.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 250,218 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanse additionally removes all Disease and Poison effects.
Lay on Hands grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec and now ignores healing reduction effects.
Hammer of Justice's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.
Leap atop your Charger for 5 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
Judgment deems the target unworthy, preventing the next 161,721 damage dealt by the target.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.
Instantly cast Holy Shock on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.
Blessing of Freedom increases movement speed by 30%, and you gain Blessing of Freedom when cast on a friendly target.
Armor increased by 24%, Stamina increased by 12% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 7%.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Shield of the Righteous heals you and up to 2 nearby allies for 1.0% of maximum health.

Divine Steed reduces the cooldown of 4 nearby ally's major movement ability by 3.0 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 3%.
Divine Protection increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
Mastery increased by 4% and intellect increased by 4%.
Hammer of Wrath deals 50% increased damage to enemies below 35% health.
Consecration heals you and 5 allies within it for 5,070 every 0.8 sec.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 15% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 251,068 Holy damage to an enemy, or 431,287 healing to an ally.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Word of Glory and Light of Dawn gain up to 30% additional chance to critically strike, based on their target's current health. Lower health targets are more likely to be critically struck.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 228,076.
Holy Shock now has 2 charges and it refunds 50% of its mana cost when cast on an enemy.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

Devotion Aura: Damage reduction increased to 12%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Casting Flash of Light or Holy Light grants 1 Holy Power.
Lay on Hands' cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec per Holy Power spent and restores 5% of your Mana.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.

Fires a beam of light that scatters to strike a clump of targets. 

If the beam is aimed at an enemy target, it deals 790,091 Holy damage and radiates 611,413 healing to 5 allies within 30 yds.

If the beam is aimed at a friendly target, it heals for 1.4 million and radiates 299,888 Holy damage to 5 enemies within 30 yds.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 1.0 sec.
While above 70% health, Holy Shock's healing is increased 20%, but creates a heal absorb on you for 30% of the amount healed that prevents Beacon of Light from healing you until it has dissipated.

Judgment has a 100% chance to cast Consecration at the target's location.

The limit on Consecration does not apply to this effect.
After casting Barrier of Faith or Holy Prism, the healing of your next Holy Light or Flash of Light is increased by 20%, its cast time is reduced by 30%, and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.

When an ally with your Beacon of Light is damaged below 50% health, they absorb the next 1 million damage.

You cannot shield the same person this way twice within 1 min.
Allies with Beacon of Light receive 5% less damage.

Shield of the Righteous deals 148,204 damage to its first target struck.

Every 4 Shields of the Righteous make your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn cost no Holy Power.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional 5% of the amount healed.
Holy Shock and Judgment have a 8% increased critical strike chance.

Light of the Martyr's health threshold is reduced to 70% and increases Holy Shock's healing by an additional 5% for every 5 sec Light of the Martyr is active, stacking up to 3 times.

While below 70% health, the light urgently heals you for 23,437 every 1 sec.

Apply a Beacon of Light to your target and 4 injured allies within 30 yds for 8 sec.

All affected allies will be healed for 15% of the amount of your other healing done.

Hammer of Wrath heals up to 5 injured allies for 280% of the damage done, split evenly among them.

Flash of Light, Holy Light, and Judgment critical strikes reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 15% for 20 sec.
Judgment heals you for 292,504 and its mana cost is reduced by 30%. 50% of overhealing from this effect is transferred onto 2 allies within 40 yds.
Crusader Strike reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock and Judgment by 2.0 sec.

While in combat, your Holy Power spenders generate 1 stack of Awakening.

At 15 stacks of Awakening, your next Judgment deals 40% increased damage, will critically strike, and activates Avenging Wrath for 12 sec.
Holy Shock and Crusader Strike refund up to 10% of their Mana cost and deal up to 50% more healing or damage, based on the target's missing health.

After casting Avenging Wrath, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

After casting Divine Toll, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.
Holy Shock has a 12% chance to refund a charge when cast and its healing is increased by 10%.

Bless an ally for 30 sec, causing 12% of all healing to be converted into damage onto a nearby enemy and 12% of all damage to be converted into healing onto an injured ally within 40 yds.

Blessing of the Seasons: Turns to Autumn after use.

Casting Holy Prism or Barrier of Faith causes your next 2 Holy Power spending abilities to apply Dawnlight on your target, dealing 548,197 Radiant damage or 1.2 million healing over 8 sec.

8% of Dawnlight's damage and healing radiates to nearby allies or enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Dawnlight's healing does not transfer to Beacon of Light.
While a Dawnlight is active, your Holy Power spenders deal 5% additional damage or healing.

Heals an ally for 967,073 and an additional 159,513 over 16 sec.

Healing increased by 25% when cast on self.
Critical Strike chance of Holy Shock and Light of Dawn increased by 5%.

Movement speed increased by 5% while above 80% health.

When your health is brought below 35%, your movement speed is increased by 40% for 5 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 1 min.
Your damage and healing over time effects have a chance to increase the healing or damage of your next Holy Shock by 200%.
Holy Shock and Light of Dawn critical strikes cause the target to be healed for an additional 102,259 over 4 sec.

After you cast Holy Prism or Barrier of Faith, gain Divine Purpose.

 Divine Purpose
Your next Holy Power spending ability is free and deals 15% increased damage and healing.
Your Haste is increased by 2% for 12 sec each time you apply Dawnlight. Multiple stacks may overlap.
Light of Dawn and Holy Shock have a 15% chance to cast again at 30% effectiveness.

During Avenging Wrath, you become linked to your Dawnlights, causing 25,312 Radiant damage to enemies or 22,705 healing to allies that pass through the beams, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Activating Avenging Wrath applies up to 4 Dawnlights onto nearby allies or enemies and increases Dawnlight's duration by 20%.

Sun's Avatar's healing does not transfer to Beacon of Light.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Divine Steed's cooldown is reduced by 20%, but its duration is reduced by 40%.

Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.
Instantly cast Holy Shock on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Blessing of Freedom increases the target's movement speed by 30%. Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Sacrifice reduce the target's damage taken by 15%. These effects linger for 8 sec after the Blessing ends.
Armor increased by 24%, Stamina increased by 12% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 7%.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Shield of the Righteous heals you and up to 2 nearby allies for 1.0% of maximum health.
Allies are healed for 121,537 when you cast a Blessing spell on them and healed again for 123,647 when the blessing ends.
Divine Protection increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 19,641.
Word of Glory grants 20% bonus armor for 4.5 sec.
Mastery increased by 4% and intellect increased by 4%.
Consecration heals you and 5 allies within it for 5,070 every 0.8 sec.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 15% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Removing harmful effects with Divine Shield heals you for 10% for each effect removed.  This heal cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Divine Shield may now be cast while Forbearance is active.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 252,443 Holy damage to an enemy, or 420,634 healing to an ally.

Generates 1 Holy Power.

Fires a beam of light that scatters to strike a clump of targets. 

If the beam is aimed at an enemy target, it deals 788,109 Holy damage and radiates 586,641 healing to 5 allies within 30 yds.

If the beam is aimed at a friendly target, it heals for 1.3 million and radiates 298,527 Holy damage to 5 enemies within 30 yds.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 1.0 sec.

Hammer of Wrath heals up to 5 injured allies for 280% of the damage done, split evenly among them.

Flash of Light, Holy Light, and Judgment critical strikes reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.

You become the ultimate crusader of light for 15 sec. Crusader Strike and Judgment cool down 30% faster and heal up to 5 injured allies for 260% of the damage they deal.

If Avenging Wrath is known, also increases Judgment, Crusader Strike, and auto-attack damage by 30%.
Judgment heals you for 292,504 and its mana cost is reduced by 30%. 50% of overhealing from this effect is transferred onto 2 allies within 40 yds.
Crusader Strike reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock and Judgment by 2.0 sec.

While in combat, your Holy Power spenders generate 1 stack of Awakening.

At 15 stacks of Awakening, your next Judgment deals 40% increased damage, will critically strike, and activates Avenging Wrath for 12 sec.
Holy Shock and Crusader Strike refund up to 10% of their Mana cost and deal up to 50% more healing or damage, based on the target's missing health.

After casting Avenging Wrath, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

After casting Divine Toll, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

Bless an ally for 30 sec, causing 12% of all healing to be converted into damage onto a nearby enemy and 12% of all damage to be converted into healing onto an injured ally within 40 yds.

Blessing of the Seasons: Turns to Autumn after use.

Infusion of Light has 1 additional charge, increases Greater Judgment's effect by an additional 50%, Flash of Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%, and Holy Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%.

Imbue your weapon with the power of the Light, increasing your armor by 5% and your primary stat by 2%.

Lasts 1 hour.

If you bestow an Armament upon an ally, you also gain its benefits.

If you bestow an Armament upon yourself, a nearby ally also gains its benefits.
Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing of your next Crusader Strike by 20%.
When an Armament fades from you, the cooldown of Lay on Hands is reduced by 15.0 sec and you gain Infusion of Light.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to manifest a Holy Armament for a nearby ally.

When you or an ally wielding a Holy Bulwark are healed above maximum health, transfer 100% of the overhealing to your ally.

When you or an ally wielding a Sacred Weapon drop below 40% health, redistribute your health immediately and every 1 sec for 4 sec. May only occur once per cast.
The effect of your active Aura is increased by 33% on targets with your Armaments.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Armaments by 3.0 sec.
Judgment critical strikes cause a shockwave around the target, dealing 596,708 healing at the target's location.
Avenging Wrath summons an additional Sacred Weapon, and during Avenging Wrath your Sacred Weapon casts spells on your target and echoes the effects of your Holy Power abilities.

Your allies affected by your Aura gain an effect after you cast Blessing of Protection or Blessing of Freedom.

 Blessing of Protection
Physical damage reduced by 30% for 6 sec.

 Blessing of Freedom
Cleared of all movement impairing effects.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Protection.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

 Crusader Aura:

Holy Power spending abilities have a 10% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 10% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Divine Storm heals you and up to 2 nearby allies for 1.0% of maximum health.

Divine Steed reduces the cooldown of 4 nearby ally's major movement ability by 3.0 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 3%.
Allies are healed for 120,760 when you cast a Blessing spell on them and healed again for 122,651 when the blessing ends.
Divine Protection increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
Mastery increased by 4% and intellect increased by 4%.
Your auto attacks heal a nearby ally for 60,938.
Hammer of Wrath deals 60% increased damage to enemies below 35% health.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 15% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Removing harmful effects with Divine Shield heals you for 10% for each effect removed.  This heal cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Divine Shield may now be cast while Forbearance is active.

Pierce an enemy with a blade of light, dealing 290,233 Holy damage.

Generates 1 Holy Power.

Unleashes a whirl of divine energy, dealing 139,002 Holy damage to all nearby enemies. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 2 sec and Crusader Strike by 2 sec.
Your Blade of Justice causes the target to burn for 109,450 Radiant damage over 9 sec.
Blade of Justice now has 2 charges.

Unleashes a powerful weapon strike that deals 262,859 Holy damage to an enemy target,

Final Verdict has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.

When your health is brought below 25%, you instantly cast a free Word of Glory at 60% effectiveness on yourself.

Cannot occur more than once every 60 sec.

Your auto attacks have a 20% chance to reset the cooldown of Blade of Justice.

Critical strikes increase the chance by an additional 10%.
Divine Storm projects an additional wave of light, striking all enemies up to 20 yds in front of you for 20% of Divine Storm's damage.

Call upon the Light and begin a crusade, increasing your haste by 3% for 27 sec.

Each Holy Power spent during Crusade increases haste and damage by an additional 3%.

Maximum 10 stacks.
Auto-attack speed increased by 40%.
Judgment generates 1 additional Holy Power and has a 50% increased chance to trigger Mastery: Highlord's Judgment.

Crusader Strike replaces your auto-attacks and deals 58,590 Physical damage, but now only generates 1 Holy Power every 2 attacks.

Inherits Crusader Strike benefits but cannot benefit from Skyfury.

Divine Hammers spin around you, striking enemies nearby for 43,612 Holy damage every 2 sec for 8 sec.

While active, each Holy Power spent increases the duration of Divine Hammer by 0.5 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Divine Storm deals 10% increased damage and when it hits an enemy affected by your Expurgation, it spreads the effect to up to 4 targets hit.

You deal 3% increased Holy damage to targets burning from your Expurgation.

Judgment empowers your next Word of Glory to automatically activate Light of Dawn with 25% increased effectiveness.

This effect can only occur every 20 sec.
Mastery: Highlord's Judgment is 50% more effective on Judgment and Hammer of Wrath. Judgment applies an additional stack of Greater Judgment if it is known.

Lash out at your enemies, dealing 356,551 Radiant damage to all enemies within 14 yds in front of you, and applying Truth's Wake, burning the targets for an additional 215,964 damage over 9 sec.

Demon and Undead enemies are also stunned for 5 sec.

Generates 3 Holy Power.
Crusader Strike and Judgment hit an additional 4 targets but deal 25% reduced damage to secondary targets.
Crusader Strike has a 15% chance to make your next Divine Storm free and deal 15% additional damage.
Critical Strike damage of your abilities increased by 5% and Hammer of Wrath also has a chance to cast Highlord's Judgment.

Creates a barrier of holy light that absorbs 3.6 million damage for 10 sec.

When the shield expires, it bursts to inflict Holy damage equal to the total amount absorbed, divided among all nearby enemies.
Your damage over time effects deal 10% more damage.
Crusader Strike, Judgment, Hammer of Wrath and your damaging single target Holy Power abilities now deal Holystrike damage and your abilities that deal Holystrike damage deal 5% increased damage.

Call down a blast of heavenly energy, dealing 615,858 Holy damage to all targets in the area and causing them to take 30% increased damage from your single target Holy Power abilities, and 15% increased damage from other Holy Power abilities for 12 sec.
Wake of Ashes deals significantly reduced damage to secondary targets, but now causes you to lash out 2 extra times for 230,727 Radiant damage.

Highlord's Judgment and Holystrike damage abilities grant you a stack of Divine Arbiter.

At 25 stacks your next damaging single target Holy Power ability causes 687,556 Holystrike damage to your primary target and 136,802 Holystrike damage to enemies within 6 yds.

Avenging Wrath is replaced with Radiant Glory.

Radiant Glory
Wake of Ashes activates Avenging Wrath for 8 sec.

Each Holy Power spent has a chance to activate Avenging Wrath for 4 sec.

When Truth's Wake critically strikes, its duration is extended by 2 sec.

Your other damage over time effects deal 30% increased damage to targets affected by Truth's Wake.
Hammer of Light instantly calls down 2 Empyrean Hammers on your target when it is cast.
After casting Hammer of Light, you call down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby target every 2 sec, for 8 sec.

When Empyrean Hammer critically strikes, 100% of its damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by this effect deal 5% reduced damage to you for 8 sec.

Wake of Ashes surrounds you with a Holy barrier for 10% of your maximum health.

Hammer of Light heals you for 5% of your maximum health, increased by 1% for each additional target hit. Any overhealing done with this effect gets converted into a Holy barrier instead.
Crusader Strike, Hammer of Wrath and Blade of Justice extend the duration of Shake the Heavens by 1 sec.
Divine Steed lasts 2 sec longer and increases your movement speed by an additional 30% for the first 3 sec.

Casting Judgment increases the damage of Empyrean Hammer by 10% for 10 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.

Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm calls down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby enemy.

While Shake the Heavens is active, this effect calls down an additional Empyrean Hammer.
Hammer of Light applies Judgment to its targets, and increases your Haste by 12% for 6 sec.

You gain a stack of Light's Deliverance when you call down an Empyrean Hammer.

While Wake of Ashes and Hammer of Light are unavailable, you consume 60 stacks of Light's Deliverance, empowering yourself to cast Hammer of Light an additional time for free.
